channel.title: API Changes on
channel.description: Recent content in API Changes on

item.title: Logging
item.description: Time format The time format for query parameters must be in Unix timestamp, which is the number of seconds that have elapsed since the Unix epoch. Millisecond is no longer allowed. The change affects the parameters start_time and end_time. Deprecated APIs The following APIs are removed: GET /workspaces/{workspace} GET /namespaces/{namespace} GET /namespaces/{namespace}/workloads/{workload} GET /namespaces/{namespace}/pods/{pod} The whole log setting API group Fluent Bit Operator In KubeSphere 3.0.0, the whole log setting APIs are removed from the KubeSphere core since the project Fluent Bit Operator is refactored in an incompatible way.

item.title: Monitoring
item.description: API Version The monitoring API version is bumped to v1alpha3. Time format The time format for query parameters must be in Unix timestamp, which is the number of seconds that have elapsed since the Unix epoch. Decimal is no longer allowed. The change affects the parameters start, end and time. Deprecated Metrics In KubeSphere 3.0.0, the metrics on the left have been renamed into the ones on the right. V2.
